detail_desc: Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Sandals with an imitation leather toe strap, narrow, adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Trainers in checked flannel with a leather heel cap, lacing at the front and slightly higher soles. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Belt with two rows of metal eyelets and a metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Dance shoes in imitation leather with glittery elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a foldover shaft. (Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.) The socks are made partly from organic cotton.
Short-sleeved nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Blouse in a plumeti viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with a lace collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Set with a long-sleeved hooded top and pair of leggings in printed jersey made from a cotton blend. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood with a wrapover front, ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft mohair and wool blend with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fully-fashioned trainers with details in plastic and imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Fully-fashioned trainers with details in imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Running vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections at the back and a racer back.
Fitted jacket in a textured bouclé weave containing some wool. V-neck with one metal button at the front. Lined. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill. Classic fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Short dress in woven fabric with tiered flounces in crinkled chiffon and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Double-layered jersey hats in a soft cotton blend.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with a button fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.

All-in-one suit in soft, patterned velour made from an organic cotton blend with a small appliqué at the top. Jersey-lined hood with ears, a zip down the front with a chin guard and wide, foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in patterned cotton jersey with a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Unlined.
Cycling shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Waist-high briefs in lace with a V-shaped opening and satin ties at the back. Lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Leather boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sun hat in a cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined.
Peep-toed ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and covered heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Short dress in airy, shimmering metallic jersey with a draped neckline at the front and rounded elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined.
Vest top in soft washed cotton jersey with hard-worn details, deep, raw-edge armholes and short slits in the sides.
Wrap dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed press-stud at the front and a tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with a high waist, small front pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Sandals in woven fabric with foot and ankle straps that have a hook and loop fastening. Moulded soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and a half-string back.
Short-sleeved, V-neck tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with pin-tucks around the neckline, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem.

Long jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and high slits in the sides. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour with long sleeves and long legs. Hood with embroidery and appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Super push-up bras in organic cotton jersey with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim with an extra-high waist. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Short coat in a lightly brushed weave. Large hood with a wide faux fur trim, concealed press-studs down the front, long sleeves and discreet pockets in the side seams. Belt loops and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Shirt in soft twill with a brushed finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Boxy jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Top in woven fabric with lace details, wide shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket, patch front pockets and one inner pocket. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Round bag in braided paper straw. Open at the top with two handles and no fasteners. Width 10 cm, diameter 30 cm.
Short-sleeved polo shirt knitted in a linen blend with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Ankle-length chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with a soft, lightly napped finish. Side pockets, flap back pockets and wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Joggers in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft lace knit with a frill around the neckline and a V-shaped flounce at the front. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in washed denim with hard-worn details, a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Visible zips at the sides and flap chest pockets with a button.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Hair grips in metal with a textured finish.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets, fake back pockets and leg pockets with a flap. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 9 cm.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back and short, wide sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie belt, and a straight-cut skirt with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Leggings in imitation leather. High waist with concealed elastication.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with decorative stripes, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and gathered skirt. Lined.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and zip at the front. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves with a slit at the cuffs and a flare to the hem.
Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck, 3/4-length puff sleeves with a gathered seam at the cuffs, an asymmetric seam under the bust and smocking at the back.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that are doubled at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Dress and a pair of cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless dress with a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Polo-neck jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with a turn-down, rib-knit collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, V-neck dress in soft, patterned viscose jersey with short, frilled sleeves and a seam under the bust. Unlined.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with a glittery print on one pocket and at the hems. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside, a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with tie-top shoulder straps, decorative gathers at the front, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
